Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I was reading about rtNEAT, and I noticed that it needs multiple agents to =
be tested simultaneously. What if it's a two player game, like computer aga=
inst human? Can rtNEAT be applied there? I'm thinking it'd be really slow, =
since each genome would have to be tested out one at a time against the hum=
an, before you can get a score.

Richard
